about_the_game:
You find yourself trapped in an eerie and seemingly abandoned metro station. There are no people in sight, yet an unsettling feeling of someone—or something—lurking in the shadows never leaves you. Your objective is simple yet daunting: escape the metro. However, every time you step through the exit, you find yourself back at the beginning, caught in a mysterious and never-ending loop.

As you explore the dim, unsettling tunnels, anomalies begin to reveal themselves—subtle at first, like objects slightly out of place, but quickly escalating into something more sinister. These anomalies twist your perception of reality, constantly blurring the lines between the mundane and the horrifying. Even though the environment appears lifeless, it reacts to your actions, and each new loop reveals fresh, bizarre distortions of the familiar station.

The further you progress, the more the anomalies intensify, and soon you're faced not only with unsettling dissonances but also terrifying beings that emerge from the shadows. Staying vigilant becomes a matter of life and death, as even a single wrong move might bring you face-to-face with a lethal monstrosity. To survive, you must adapt to the evolving horrors and outsmart the unknown forces that dwell within the metro.

Key Features

  • Over 100 Unique Anomalies: Every loop brings new disturbances—some subtle, some terrifying. The game features over 100 distinct anomalies that challenge your perception of reality, keeping each playthrough unpredictable.

  • Two Unlockable Game Modes: After completing the main story, two additional game modes become available, each offering a fresh take on the metro's mysteries. One focuses on exploration and discovery without the constant threat of danger, while the other intensifies the horror elements, providing an even more challenging and terrifying experience.

  • Evolving Horror: Experience a horror that doesn't rely solely on cheap scares but builds a deeper sense of dread through ever-changing environments and unexpected events.

  • Persistent Presence: Even though the station seems empty, you always feel like you’re not alone. This unnerving sense of presence keeps you on edge as you move through familiar yet disorienting spaces.

Prepare yourself for a uniquely terrifying experience that pushes beyond the ordinary scares, taking you deep into an immersive nightmare where every step could be your last.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features unsettling scenes, jump scares, and other typical horror game elements. This experience may not be suitable for players who are sensitive to such content.
